mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.room_name roomName, a.room_img roomImg, a.room_capacity roomCapacity, a.room_position roomPosition, a.room_equipment roomEquipment FROM conference_room a WHERE a.state = 1
AND a.room_capacity >= #{minCapacity}
AND #{maxCapacity} >= a.room_capacity
ORDER BY a.room_capacity ASC
